About Me
Let me tell you about myself and what I do

Software Engineer with a focus on front-end

I am a Full stack Software Engineer with a focus on front-end, who is an avid learner of new technologies. I specialize in NERD stack (Node, Express, React, React-Redux and Postgres database) and MERN stack (MongoDB, Express, React, Redux, Node). I also dabble in Python as well as some Data Science when I am not sharpening my NERD. I feel very comfortable designing and analyzing algorithms as well as learning new technologies.
